mapper.update: update mkt_verbal set CAMPAIGN_ID = #{campaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CONTACT_CONF_ID = #{contactConfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SCRIPT_DESC = #{scriptDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where VERBAL_ID = #{verbalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select VERBAL_ID, CAMPAIGN_ID, CONTACT_CONF_ID, SCRIPT_DESC, CHANNEL_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_verbal where VERBAL_ID = #{verbalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select VERBAL_ID, CAMPAIGN_ID, CONTACT_CONF_ID, SCRIPT_DESC, CHANNEL_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_verbal
